allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add guild war queue \(30 players\) and display player stats in embeds

- Add new guild_war queue type with 30-player capacity, trophy emoji, and purple color
- Add /setup guild-war command with reset and close support
- Display gear score \(goose format\) and arena rank in queue embeds
- Fetch player stats from player_registrations via LEFT JOIN
- Add database migration to update queue_type CHECK constraint
- Add English and Vietnamese translations for guild war queue

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
